definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: All my brothers are killing each other for the throne.
sentences.chinese: 我的兄弟們爲了皇位相互殺戮。

sentences.english: Sihon king of the Amorites His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 就是殺戮亞摩利王西宏，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: It is the clearest possible directive to Gaddafi and his cohorts to end the killing.
sentences.chinese: 這是要求卡扎菲和同夥結束殺戮最爲明確的一項指令。

sentences.english: Investigators were baffled by the killings and the absence of a motive.
sentences.chinese: 調查人員對殺戮行爲本身及其動機的缺乏感到困惑。

sentences.english: The Team That Slays Together… Win 30 matches in Team Slayers.
sentences.chinese: 在組隊殺戮者模式中贏得30場比賽。

sentences.english: I think there's a deep human reluctance to kill other people.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲人類自內心深處就對殺戮有排斥。

sentences.english: Wandering on a moonlit night of the killing, harvester knife pregnant think the night wind's whisper.
sentences.chinese: 徘徊在月夜的殺戮，持刀的收割者懷想着夜風的絮語。

sentences.english: a bayonet was a tool with a worker at each end
sentences.chinese: 刺刀是一種兩頭站着工人的殺戮工具。

sentences.english: I was shocked that he didn't tell me they filmed a murder.
sentences.chinese: 我很震驚他沒有告訴我他們拍攝到了一場殺戮。

sentences.english: It's a darkly beautiful souvenir of conspiracy and killing.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個黑暗而又美麗的關於陰謀和殺戮的紀念品。

sentences.english: The land is also defiled by illicit homicide.
sentences.chinese: 土地依舊被不正當的殺戮所玷污。

sentences.english: There’d be no more killing tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上不用再行殺戮。

sentences.english: They dragged up a young boy's body who was the victim of a ritualistic killing.
sentences.chinese: 他們拖出了一具男孩的屍體，他是儀式殺戮的受害者。

sentences.english: Captured international assassins are locked up inside a high-tech bunker known as the Killing Chamber.
sentences.chinese: 佔領國際刺客被鎖在高科技掩體稱爲殺戮室。

sentences.english: The dreaded Gargoyles of Northrend are voracious flying creatures who revel in slaughter and mayhem.
sentences.chinese: 令人畏懼的石像鬼這種貪婪的飛行生物喜愛殺戮。

sentences.english: Innocents were brutally liquidated by thousands.
sentences.chinese: 數以千計的無辜者遭到殘忍地殺戮。

definition: to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
